  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>eln:demoportal</catalog>
            <entry>2082</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="no">Solenergi</string>
            <string language="en">solar energy</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Solarenergie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">énergie solaire</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">energia solar</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">energia solare</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ηλιακή ενέργεια</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">energía solar</string>
          </title>
          <language>no</language>
          <description>
            <string language="no">Hvordan kan solstrålene benyttes til å produsere elektrisk kraft?
Hva skjer hvis det er overskyet eller om natten?</string>
            <string language="en">How can we use the sunbeams to produce electrical power? What happens if it is cloudy or after sunset.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="no">solenergi</string>
            <string language="en">solar energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="no">solcellepanel</string>
            <string language="en">solar panel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="no">solinnstråling</string>
            <string language="en">solaraccessibility.</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wie können wir die Sunbeams benutzen, um 
elektrische Energie zu produzieren? Was geschieht, wenn es oder 
nach Sonnenuntergang bewölkt ist.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Comment pouvons-nous employer les rayons de soleil pour
produire le courant électrique ? Ce qui se produit s'il est 
nuageux ou après coucher du soleil.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Como podemos nós usar os sunbeams produzir a 
potência elétrica? O que acontece se for cloudy ou após o por
do sol.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Come possiamo usare i raggi di sole per produrre 
la corrente elettrica? Che cosa accade se è nuvoloso o dopo il 
tramonto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πώς μπορούμε να χρησιμοποιήσουμε τις ηλιαχτίδες για να
παραγάγουμε την ηλεκτρική δύναμη; Αυτό που συμβαίνει εάν 
είναι νεφελώδες ή μετά από το ηλιοβασίλεμα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Cómo podemos utilizar los rayos de sol para 
producir corriente eléctrica? Qué sucede si está nublado o 
después de puesta del sol.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Solarenergie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Solarpanel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">solaraccessibility.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">énergie solaire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">panneau solaire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">solaraccessibility.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">energia solar</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">painel solar</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">solaraccessibility.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">energia solare</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">pannello solare</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">solaraccessibility.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ηλιακή ενέργεια</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ηλιακή επιτροπή</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">solaraccessibility.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">energía solar</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">panel solar</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">solaraccessibility.</string>
          </keyword>
